brewing_steps.short_instruction: Stir gently • Break up dry pockets

title: V60 Family Brew
preparation_steps: Grind 45 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Use V60 03 size for larger capacity

brewing_steps.instruction: Bloom: Pour 90g water (2x coffee weight), stir gently in circular motion
First pour: Add 180g water in slow, steady spiral, reaching 270g total
brewing_steps.short_instruction: First pour 180g water • Slow steady spiral
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue with the brewing process. First pour: Add 180g water in slow, steady spiral, reaching 270g total Take your time and focus on technique.
Wait for 35 seconds to allow proper extraction.

brewing_steps.instruction: Second pour: Add 225g water, reaching 495g total
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue with the brewing process. Second pour: Add 225g water, reaching 495g total Take your time and focus on technique. Every step contributes to the final cup quality.
Wait for 30 seconds to allow proper extraction.

brewing_steps.instruction: Final pour: Add remaining 225g water to reach 720g total
brewing_steps.audio_script: Final pour to complete the brew. Add the remaining water to reach 225 grams total. Pour gently and steadily, maintaining control as you approach the target weight.
